TABLE.NAME: local_iomad_oidc_sync
TABLE.COMMENT: Holds the settings required by the local IOMAD OIDC sync plugins

FIELD.NAME: tenantnameorguid
FIELD.COMMENT: Companies Tenant name or GUID as defined in Azure.

FIELD.NAME: syncgroupid
FIELD.COMMENT: Object ID of the group to be synchronized

FIELD.NAME: approved
FIELD.COMMENT: set to 1 if approval has been given 0 otherwise

FIELD.NAME: useroption
FIELD.COMMENT: field to determine what happens with user accounts that no longer exist. 0 - do nothing 1 - suspend 2 - delete

FIELD.NAME: unsuspendonsync
FIELD.COMMENT: Do we un-suspend suspended users when we sync.
